titleStmt.title: Order to supply seed Year 8 of Domitianus Choiak 22 [88 Dec. 18]
titleStmt.author: Phlauios Herakleides, (Strategos of the Oxyrhynchite Nome, Egypt)

msContents.summary: Order to supply seed from the Oxyrhynchite Nome, Egypt, written on papyrus. Written by Flavius Herakleides who is the strategos, or highest civil official in the region, of the Oxyrhynchite Nome. He orders the person in charge of a granary to supply a sixty-three-year-old farmer, with seed from last year's crops for state-owned land. According to Theon, scribe of the district, and Ammonios, the village scribe of Psobthis(?), the farmer had leased the land before and now it is part of the imperial estate of Domitianus near Psobthis(?). The person in charge of the granary is also ordered to supply the farmer with seed for state-owned land from the plot formerly owned by Euphranor. Gaius, the royal scribe, also has to authorize the

msItemStruct.note: Actual dimensions of item are 12.8 x 5.6 cm
Written along the fibers on the recto
Lower margin of 1 cm.; small right margin
Author's name is known from another papyrus, P.Koln 3, 137 which has been published in: Kolner Papyri. Vol. 3. Opladen: Westdeutscher Verlag, 1980, p. 59-65

supportDesc.support: 1 item : papyrus, mounted in glass, incomplete ; 13 x 6 cm
